articles.author: Allan Smith
articles.title: Michael Avenatti withdrew his petition to be admitted into Michael Cohen's case after Trump's lawyer hit him with a broadside in court
articles.description: It wasn't a great day in court for Stormy Daniels' attorney, Michael Avenatti. He withdrew his petition to appear before the court after it adjourned for the day. The attorneys for President Donald Trump and his longtime lawyer Michael Cohen went after him.

articles.author: Bob Bryan
articles.title: Trump looks prepared to kick off a trade war with the European Union
articles.description: President Donald Trump will annouce tariffs on steel and aluminum imports form the European Union as soon as Thursday, according to a new report. The tariffs come after negotiations between the EU and US failed to reach an alternative trade deal.

articles.author: Troy Wolverton
articles.title: The smartphone industry is slumping — and it may drag Apple and the iPhone down with it
articles.description: BI PRIME: Smartphone sales fell last year and are expected to decline again this year. That could spell bad news for Apple, Maxim Group's Nehal Chokshi says.

articles.author: Graham Rapier
articles.title: Warren Buffett reportedly tried to invest $3 billion in Uber
articles.description: Warren Buffett reportedly tried to invest $3 billion in Uber

articles.author: Joe Ciolli
articles.title: A $1.8 trillion investing behemoth explains why the next recession will be an entirely different beast — and outlines what traders can do to prepare
articles.description: BI PRIME: Pimco just published a secular outlook spanning the next three to five years. The firm argues the next recession will be different than the last, and makes recommendations around what investors can do to prepare for the inevitable meltdown.

articles.author: Kara Chin, Jacqui Frank, Sara Silverstein
articles.title: Millennials are leading an investment revolution — here's what makes their generation different
articles.description: Nuveen's "Third Annual Responsible Investing Survey" of over 1,000 affluent investors found there is increased interest in working for, buying from, and investing in socially responsible companies. This is even more true among the millennials surveyed.

articles.author: Allan Smith
articles.title: A federal judge just gave Michael Cohen a tight new deadline, and it could lead to the worst-case scenario for him and Trump
articles.description: US District Judge Kimba Wood on Wednesday set a new deadline for Michael Cohen's lawyers to finish reviewing more than 2 million remaining documents for privilege designations.

articles.author: Alex Morrell
articles.title: Citigroup's CEO has revealed just how much the bank is spending on tech — and it shows the speed with which Wall Street is changing
articles.description: BI PRIME: Citigroup is dedicating 20% of its expense budget to technology, according to CEO Michael Corbat. That works out to about $8 billion in 2018.

articles.author: Melia Robinson
articles.title: MARY MEEKER'S TECH STATE OF THE UNION: Everything happening on the internet in 2018
articles.description: The tech investor Mary Meeker of Kleiner Perkins has dropped the 2018 edition of the "Internet Trends Report" at Vox Media's Code Conference. We republished the presentation in full.

articles.author: Bryan Logan
articles.title: After Trump was elected, Obama questioned whether his own presidency had come '10 or 20 years too early'
articles.description: One of President Barack Obama's close advisers, Ben Rhodes, wrote about an exchange between Obama and some of his aides shortly after Donald Trump was elected. During the conversation, Obama questioned whether he had overestimated his own legacy.
